The Story of the Female Ghost Rathakāra
“A beautiful, shining, coral-tree flower,
Having ascended a mansion with many rooms,
There you shine, goddess of great splendor,

original: Pathaddhani pannaraseva cando.🔽Vaṇṇo ca te kanakassa sannibho,
analyzed: cando  vaṇṇaḥ ca te kanakassa sannibhaḥ
translated: Like the moon on the fifteenth night. 🔽Your complexion is like gold,
Your form is radiant and lovely to behold.
Seated on an incomparable, excellent couch,

original: Ekā tuvaṁ natthi ca tuyha sāmiko.
analyzed: ekā tuvam natthi ca tuyha sāmiko
translated: You are alone, and you have no husband.

original: Imā ca te pokkharaṇī samantā,🔽Pahūtamalyā bahupuṇḍarīkā;
analyzed: imā ca te pokkharaṇī samantā  bahu puṇḍarīkā
translated: And all around you are these lotus ponds, 🔽With abundant garlands and many lotuses,
Surrounded by gold dust,

original: Na tattha paṅko paṇako ca vijjati.
analyzed: na tattha paṅko paṇako ca vijjati
translated: And no mud or mire is found there.

analyzed: hasā cime dassanīyā manoramā  udakasmim anupariyanti sabbadā
translated: These geese are lovely to behold, 🔽Always gliding on the water.
All of them sound their lovely, melodious calls,
Like the sound of a drum.
Shining with glory, you shine,
And you stand holding onto a ship.
Laughing and speaking affectionately to Āḷāra,
You shine forth, all-beautiful one.
This spotless mansion stands firm and level,
With a park, a pleasure garden, and a lake.
I wish to see a woman of unusual beauty,
To enjoy with you in Nandana.”
“Do a deed here that will bring you a reward here,

analyzed: cittam ca te idha nihitam bhavatu
translated: And let your mind be set on this place.
Having done a deed here that will bring you a reward here,
Then you can get me, a woman who desires you.”

original: “Sādhū”ti so tassā paṭissuṇitvā,🔽Akāsi kammaṁ tahiṁ vedanīyaṁ;
analyzed: sādhu iti saḥ tassā paṭissuṇitvā  kammam tahim vedanīya
translated: “Very well,” he agreed,🔽And he did a deed that would bring him a reward there.
Having done a deed that would bring him a reward there,
